Text:
This is actually episode 8.
Episode 7 "Tribal Fishing" did not air.

I checked at least 3 ep guides before uploading, they all labeled this as ep 8.

Amazon lists this as episode 6. "Tribal Fishing" is listed on wikipedia as a special. If it airs off the regular schedule, it's usually a special. All 3 seasons have had 7 episodes each.
Zap2it isn't perfect, but I trust it and wikipedia the most.

http://www.amazon.com/River-Monsters-Season-3-na/dp/B0050QNOAM/ref=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&qid=1307392834&sr=8-5
